title: Create react-supervisor for frontend implementation
description: Create react-supervisor.md in .claude/agents/ with beads workflow, UI constraints, frontend reviews requirement, and React best practices skill requirement. Tech stack: Astro 5 + React 19 + TypeScript + Tailwind v4.

title: Implement Beads Orchestration
description: Set up beads orchestration infrastructure including agents, hooks, settings, and react-supervisor for the blog project

title: Archive claude-beginner files and update blog links
description: Move legacy .claude/commands/*.md and specs/ files (except specs/components/*) to src/assets/archive/claude-beginner/. Update GithubLink URLs in both blog posts (claude-code-system-prompting-and-commands.mdx, claude-code-spec-driven-development.mdx) to point to new archive paths. Keep CLAUDE.md and specs/components/post/GithubLink.md links pointing to blob/main/.

comments.author: Andriyan Ivanov

title: Add Linux x64 compatibility to devcontainer
description: Add platform: linux/amd64 to docker-compose.yml to force x64 architecture. Required for beads-kanban-ui package which lacks ARM64 support.

comments.author: Andriyan Ivanov
comments.text: Completed: Added platform: linux/amd64 to docker-compose.yml for ARM64 host compatibility
